isis.stitle: ANTILOCK BRAKES/TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - PRINCIPLES, OPERATION AND SERVICE - OPERATION - TRACTION ACTIVE LIGHT

svcproc.title: TRACTION ACTIVE LIGHT
svcproc.para: The traction active light is located in the right gauge cluster. This light turns ON for a bulb test when the key is turned on, then goes out. The light will turn ON during vehicle operation to indicate that the traction control system is currently working to reduce wheel slip that the sensors have detected.
The controller has a ground switch that opens (light OFF) and closes (light ON) the traction active light ground circuit in response to programmed instructions.
